channel.title: people on ISP - Image and Signal Processing group
channel.description: Recent content in people on ISP - Image and Signal Processing group

item.title: Jesus Malo
item.description: I’m interested in understanding human vision from information theoretic principles. This statistical view has implications in experimental and computational neuroscience. See the ex-cathedra statement

item.title: Gustau Camps-Valls
item.description: My research is related to statistical learning for modeling and understanding the Earth system.

item.title: Gherardo Varando
item.description: My research focus on probabilistic graphical models: Bayesian networks/DAG, Gaussian graphical models, staged event trees. Recently I am interested in structural recovery from spatio-temporal data, causal discovery and applications for the Earth sciences.
